thread.title: Attend Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina Football Game and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Hotel
thread.title_full: Attend Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina Football Game and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Hotel

title: Attend Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina Football Game and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Hotel
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Attend Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina Football Game and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Hotel Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter hotel, located near Dunwoody, Georgia, offers premium accommodations for fans attending the Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina football game on October 3. We look forward to welcoming ACC football fans in town for the Georgia Tech/North Carolina game. ATLANTA, GA, September 30,   The Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter hotel North near Dunwoody, Georgia, offers premium accommodations to fans attending the Georgia Tech vs. North Carolina football game on October 3. Kickoff time will be 3:30pm at Bobby Dodd Stadium. The game is part of Georgia Tech's Family Weekend, which includes a variety of on-campus activities and a special tailgating party. "We look forward to welcoming ACC football fans in town for the Georgia Tech/North Carolina game," shares Alex Morales, Director of Sales and Marketing at the Sheraton. "Our hotel is just five minutes from the Dunwoody MARTA Station, and fans can take a train to the game," explains Morales. The award winning Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North is a top Atlanta Perimeter Center hotel , offering contemporary guest rooms with Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Beds. Hotel amenities include a business center, fitness center, and seasonal outdoor pool. Sheraton's onsite restaurant, Parkside Grille and Lounge, serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service. Club level guests have access to Sheraton's private Club Lounge, which offers complimentary continental breakfast, evening hors d'oeuvres, and high speed Internet access. Free weekday shuttle service is available to locations with a 3-mile radius of the hotel including Perimeter Mall and the Dunwoody MARTA Station. Guests can take a MARTA train to downtown Atlanta, the Buckhead shopping and entertainment area, and the airport. The Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding guest service. Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North is located near the junction of I-285 and GA 400. AAA and senior discounts are available. Starwood Preferred Guests will enjoy complimentary Internet access and earn points toward free hotel nights. For more information about the Georgia Tech football schedule, visit www.ramblinwreck.com . To book your stay at the Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Hotel North, call 404-564-3000 or visit online at www.ATLANTAPERIMETERHOTEL.com .About Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North From the moment you enter this Perimeter hotel's warm and stylish lobby until you rest your head on The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed, you'll feel at ease and at home. Enjoy breakfast in the Parkside Grille before heading out for the day's activities. The Georgia Aquarium, New World of Coca-Cola, CNN Center, and Six Flags Over Georgia are all a short distance away. This Perimeter hotel's complimentary courtesy shuttle will take you to the nearby Perimeter Mall featuring Nordstrom, Macy's, Von Maur, and Dillard's. Experience all that Atlanta has to offer while escaping the rush of the city at the new Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North. For more information visit: http://www.ATLANTAPERIMETERHOTEL.COM For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
